description: You stand at the entrance of an old stone dungeon. Cool air drifts from within.
A damp corridor stretches ahead, the stone walls slick and cold.
A small chamber lit by a flickering torch that throws long shadows.
An abandoned guard post with splintered chairs and scattered debris.
A wide cavern where your footsteps echo loudly into the dark.
Moss-covered steps lead to a landing that smells faintly of earth.
Dusty shelves and torn scrolls fill a quiet, forgotten library.
A small hidden alcove, dry and still, like a place to catch your breath.
A narrow stream runs along the floor, its water cold and clear.
A cracked stone bridge spans a dark drop, the air cooler here.
A forgotten shrine with worn carvings and a broken stone basin.
Shallow water covers the floor of this passage, rippling as you move.
An old armory with rusted racks and dented armor piled in corners.
Thick webs hang from the ceiling, sticky strands brushing your shoulders.
A collapsed chamber filled with rubble and cracked stone slabs.
Pale crystals glow softly from the walls, lighting the room in blue.
A narrow tunnel where a steady wind carries distant, unknown sounds.
A still underground lake reflects the ceiling like dark glass.
A quiet vault with smooth stone walls and a heavy feeling in the air.
A sealed stone door stands here, marked with faint symbols and scratches.
